text:
Hello <@U01TMJC6CM9> and welcome to HubSpot developers! We currently don't have a .NET client library but here is a link to the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/overview|Client Libraries> that we officially support right now.
• Node.js
• PHP
• Ruby
• Python

Hello <@U01TAP4987Q>, have you checked out the HubSpot app marketplace yet? Here is an example of a <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/analytics-data/powerbi|HubSpot/Power BI> app that could be a potential solution.

If you can't find an app in our marketplace or elsewhere that gives you the level of customization you need then you can use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/overview|public HubSpot APIs> to build the the app requirements you need for your situation.

Hello <@U01T53CHBBK>, we also have a separate Forms API (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/v2/submit_form|linked here>) that works with _application/x-www-form-urlencoded_ content types.
Is there a way to upload pdf file to a contact property or attached to the contact record?
Should be able to via a "file" type contact property: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/contacts/property-field-types-in-HubSpot>
Hi team, I am looking for some clever people to help or guide me to someone who can help - integrate HubSpot with Unleashed - Inventory Management Software
I have a tightly defined use case that I can share to size up and scope
